summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6135 for the improvement of 30th Avenue Southwest from Avalon Way to West Nevada Street; and certain others and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85360, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
